name: reslate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to repair a roof by covering it with new slates (= small thin pieces of dark grey stone): I can't afford to have my roof reslated, so is there a temporary solution? In 1960, the old church had to be re-slated at a cost of £400. Related word
slate verb (ROCK)
More examplesFewer examplesShe repainted the front of the house, and even reslated the roof, but there was still little interest from buyers.Our roof was reslated with tiles salvaged from the old roof.The listed building has been wonderfully refurbished, reglazed, and reslated.
